summary: Great Britain is an island in the Atlantic Ocean, off the coast of Europe. It is made up of England, Scotland, and Wales and is the largest island in Europe. The island has a mild climate and has been home to humans for about 30,000 years. With over 60 million people, it is one of the most populated islands globally. The term 'Great Britain' also describes the political region of these three countries, which, along with Northern Ireland, forms the United Kingdom.
title: Great Britain
